snippets:
[ //https://github.com/artisticat1/obsidian-latex-suite //{trigger: string, replacement: string, options: string, description?: string, priority?: number,defaults to 0} //resolving conflict use :,too short abbrevation press tab to unfold //Math Mode //to Math Mode { trigger: "(mk|Mk)", replacement: "$$0$", options: "rtA" }, { trigger: "dm", replacement: "$$$0$$", options: "tA" }, //Text Mode //Callouts { trigger: "הגדרה", replacement: ">[!def] הגדרה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "משפט", replacement: ">[!theorem] משפט: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "נוסחה", replacement: ">[!formula] נוסחה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "מסקנה", replacement: ">[!info] מסקנה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "טענה", replacement: ">[!info] טענה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "דוגמה", replacement: ">[!example] דוגמה: $0", options: "t" }, { trigger: "הערות", replacement: ">[!notes] הערות: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "הערה", replacement: ">[!notes] הערה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "ציטוט", replacement: ">[!quote]- ציטוט $0: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "TODO", replacement: ">[!TODO] TODO: $0", options: "t" }, { trigger: "שאלה", replacement: ">[!Question]- $0? \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "עשה", replacement: ">[!success] עשה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "אל תעשה", replacement: ">[!failure] אל תעשה: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "תרגיל", replacement: "\n---\n**תרגיל**:\n$0\n\n---", options: "t" }, { trigger: "example", replacement: ">[!example] Example: $0", options: "t" }, { trigger: "notes", replacement: ">[!notes] Notes: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "note", replacement: ">[!notes] Note: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "def", replacement: ">[!def] Definition: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "theo", replacement: ">[!theorem] Theorem: \n >", options: "t" }, { trigger: "epre", replacement: "
<\/pre>", options: "t" },

    { trigger: "bre", replacement: "
", options: "t" },

    //Annoying words:
    { trigger: "פרמטר", replacement: "פרמטריזציה", options: "t" },
    { trigger: "דיפ", replacement: "דיפרנציאביליות", options: "t" },
    { trigger: "קוואזיס", replacement: "קוואזיסטטי", options: "t" },
    { trigger: "קוואזיל", replacement: "קוואזילינארי", options: "t" },
    { trigger: "אינוור", replacement: "אינווריאנט", options: "t" },
    { trigger: "קואורד", replacement: "קואורדינטות", options: "t" },
    //Names
    { trigger: "schrod", replacement: "Schrödinger", options: "tA" },//abb.
    
    

    // General:
    //Environments
    { trigger: "beg", replacement: "\\begin{$0}\n\n$1\\end{$0}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{pmatrix}", options: "MA" },
    { trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}$0\\end{pmatrix}", options: "nA" },
    { trigger: "bmat", replacement: "\\begin{bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{bmatrix}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Bmat", replacement: "\\begin{Bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Bmatrix}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vmat", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{vmatrix}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Vmat", replacement: "\\begin{Vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Vmatrix}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "case", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n$0\n\\end{cases}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "align", replacement: "\\begin{aligned}\n$0\n\\end{aligned}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "box", replacement: "\\boxed{$0 }", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "arr", replacement: "\\begin{array}{$0}\n$1\n\\end{array}", options: "mA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "gauss", replacement: "\\left(\\begin{array}{ccc|c}\n$0\n\\end{array}\\right)", options: "mA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "matrix", replacement: "\\begin{matrix}\n$0\n\\end{matrix}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "gath", replacement: "\\begin{gathered}\n$0\n\\end{gathered}", options: "mA" },

    //Spacing
    { trigger: "\\\\\\n([0-9])ex", replacement: "\\[[[0]]ex]\n", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\([0-9])ex", replacement: "\\[[[0]]ex]", options: "rmA" },
    
    { trigger: "disp", replacement: "\\displaystyle", options: "mA" },
    
    // Greek letters
    {trigger: "@a", replacement: "\\alpha ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@A", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@b", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@B", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@c", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@C", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@g", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@G", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@d", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@D", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@e", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@E", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":e", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":E", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@p", replacement: "\\phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":p", replacement: "\\varphi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@Z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@t", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@T", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@K", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@l", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@L", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@m", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@M", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@r", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@R", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@s", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@S", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ome", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@o", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@O", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "([^\\\\])(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL})",
     replacement: "[[0]]\\[[1]]", options: "rmA"},//Add backslash before greek letters and symbols
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL})([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}) hat", replacement: "\\hat{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}) tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}) dot", replacement: "\\dot{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}) bar", replacement: "\\bar{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}) und", replacement: "\\underline{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA" },

    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])hat", replacement: "\\hat{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])dot", replacement: "\\dot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z0])bar", replacement: "\\bar{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])und", replacement: "\\underline{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])mbf", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z])cl", replacement: "\\mathcal{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},

    // If there is '\mathbf' before
    { trigger: "(\\\\mathbf{[A-Za-z]})dot", replacement: "\\dot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "(\\\\mathbf{[A-Za-z]})hat", replacement: "\\hat{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "(\\\\mathbf{[A-Za-z]})tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 1},

    // If there is '\boldsymbol' before
    { trigger: "(\\\\boldsymbol{\\\\(${GREEK})})dot", replacement: "\\dot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 2},
    { trigger: "(\\\\boldsymbol{\\\\(${GREEK})})hat", replacement: "\\hat{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 2},
    { trigger: "(\\\\boldsymbol{\\\\(${GREEK})})tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{[[0]]}", options: "rmA" , priority: 2},
    { trigger: "([A-Za-z][A-Za-z])frw", replacement: "\\overset{\\, \\Huge\\frown }{ [[0]] } $0", options: "rmA" , priority: 2},

    { trigger: "stth", replacement: "\\enclose{horizontalstrike}{$0}$1", options: "mA" },

    //Letter Ornament
    { trigger: "txt", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "mbf", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}$1", options: "mA" },//vector and matrix
    { trigger: "mbb", replacement: "\\mathbb{$0}$1", options: "mA" },//space
    { trigger: "mrm", replacement: "\\mathrm{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "mcl", replacement: "\\mathcal{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "mfk", replacement: "\\mathfrak{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "mtt", replacement: "\\mathtt{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "msc", replacement: "\\mathscr{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "bolds", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    
    { trigger: "sq", replacement: "^{2}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "cb", replacement: "^{3}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "^", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "{(\\\\${GREEK})}_{(.*)}sq", replacement: "{{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}}^{2}", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    { trigger: "(${VAR})sq(?=[^{}]*$)", replacement: "{{[[0]]}}^{2}", options: "rmA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "{(\\\\${GREEK})}_{(.*)}cb", replacement: "{{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}}^{3}", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    { trigger: "(${VAR})cb(?=[^{}]*$)", replacement: "{{[[0]]}}^{3}", options: "rmA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "{(\\\\${GREEK})}_{(.*)}\\^", replacement: "{{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}}^{$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    { trigger: "(${VAR})\\^(?=[^{}]*$)", replacement: "{{[[0]]}}^{$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 2},
    
    { trigger: "_", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "([a-zA-Z])_", replacement: "{[[0]]}_{$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK})_", replacement: "{\\[[0]]}_{$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "inv", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "sts", replacement: "_\\text{$0}", options: "mA" },
    //Auto subscript
    { trigger: "([a-zA-Z])([0-9])", replacement: "{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK})([0-9])", replacement: "{\\[[0]]}_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA",priority:1 },
    { trigger: "{?([a-zA-Z])}?_{([0-9])}([0-9])", replacement: "{[[0]]}_{[[1]][[2]]}", options: "rmMA" },
    { trigger: "{?\\\\(${GREEK})}?_{([0-9])}([0-9])", replacement: "{\\[[0]]}_{[[1]][[2]]}", options: "rmMA" ,priority:1 },
    
    
    { trigger: ":sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{ $0 }$1", options: "mA" ,priority:1},//conflict with sq  
    { trigger: "::sq", replacement: "\\sqrt[$0]{ $1 }$2", options: "mA" ,priority:1},//conflict with :sq
    { trigger: "udst", replacement: "\\underset{ $0 }{ $1 } $2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "ovst", replacement: "\\overset{ $0 }{ $1 } $2", options: "mA" },

    //Errors
    { trigger: "eabs", replacement: "e_{\\text{abs}} ", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "erel", replacement: "e_{\\text{rel}} ", options: "mA"},
    
    { trigger: "\\mathrm{d}ot", replacement: "\\ddot{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "\\ddot s", replacement: "\\ddots{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "bar", replacement: "\\bar{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "hat", replacement: "\\hat{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dot", replacement: "\\dot{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vec", replacement: "\\vec{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "und", replacement: "\\underline{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "tilde", replacement: "\\tilde{$0}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "ovln", replacement: "\\overline{$0}$1", options: "mA", priority: 1 },

    {trigger: "clr", replacement: "\\color{${0:white}} $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "clrb", replacement: "\\colorbox{${1:black}} $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "fclb", replacement: "\\fcolorbox{${0:black}}{${1:black}} $2", options: "mA"},

    //Brackets
    { trigger: "(", replacement: "(${VISUAL})", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "[", replacement: "[${VISUAL}]", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "{", replacement: "{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mA" },

    //General math
    //Operators
    {trigger: "([^\\\\])(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc|arg)",
     replacement: "[[0]]\\[[1]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc)([A-Za-gi-z0-9])",
     replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs. Skips letter "h" and to allow sinh, cosh, etc.
    {trigger: "\\\\sinc",
     replacement: "\\mathrm{sinc} ", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "\\\\(arcsinh|arccosh|arctanh|arccoth|arcsch|arcsech|sinh|cosh|tanh|coth|csch|sinc)([A-Za-z0-9])",
     replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs
    {trigger: "\\\\(cdot|in|neq|leq|geq|times)([A-Za-z]|[0-9])",
     replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA", priority: 1}, // Insert space after signs
    { trigger: "div", replacement: "\\mathrm{div}\\, \\vec{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "curl", replacement: "\\mathrm{curl}\\, \\vec{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "conj", replacement: "\\mathrm{conj}($0)$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "trace", replacement: "\\mathrm{tr}($0)", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "span", replacement: "\\mathrm{span}\\{$0\\}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dim", replacement: "\\dim($0)", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "rank", replacement: "\\mathrm{r}($0)", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "ker", replacement: "\\ker($0)", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "rect", replacement: "\\mathrm{rect}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "tent", replacement: "\\mathrm{tent}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "erf", replacement: "\\mathrm{erf}", options: "m" },
    { trigger: "erfc", replacement: "\\mathrm{erfc}", options: "m" },
    
    { trigger: "quad", replacement: "\\quad ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "qquad", replacement: "\\qquad ", options: "mA", priority: 1 },
    
    { trigger: "phan", replacement: "\\phantom{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vphab", replacement: "\\vphantom{\\left( \\dfrac{1}{1} \\right)}$0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vphaf", replacement: "\\vphantom{\\dfrac{1}{1} }$0", options: "mA" },
    
    { trigger: ", ", replacement: ",\\, $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "max", replacement: "\\max_{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "min", replacement: "\\min_{$0}$1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "f9", replacement: "f($0)", options: "mA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "lang", replacement: "\\langle $0 \\rangle", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "rang", replacement: "\\rangle", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "angs", replacement: "Å", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "hline", replacement: "\\hline", options: "mA" },
    
    { trigger: "exp", replacement: "\\exp $0", options: "mA",priority:1},

    { trigger: "//", replacement: "\\dfrac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "per", replacement: "\/", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "set", replacement: "\\{ $0 \\}", options: "m" },
    { trigger: "setm", replacement: "\\setminus ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "unc", replacement: "\\unicode{$0} ", options: "mA" },
    

    { trigger: "sum", replacement: "\\sum $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dsum", replacement: "\\sum_{${0:n=0}}^{${1:\\infty}}$2 ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "prod", replacement: "\\prod", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dprod", replacement: "\\prod_{${0:n=0}}^{${1:\\infty}}$2 ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "lim", replacement: "\\lim_{ ${0:n} \\to ${1:\\infty}}$2", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "ooo", replacement: "\\infty ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "+-", replacement: "\\pm ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "-+", replacement: "\\mp ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "...", replacement: "\\dots ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "c...", replacement: "\\cdots ", options: "mA",priority:1 },
    { trigger: "v...", replacement: "\\vdots ", options: "mA",priority:1 },
    { trigger: "d...", replacement: "\\ddots ", options: "mA",priority:1 },
    { trigger: "i...", replacement: "⋰ ", options: "mA",priority:1 },
    
    { trigger: "<->", replacement: "\\leftrightarrow ", options: "mA" ,priority:1},
    { trigger: "mpt", replacement: "\\mapsto ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "=>", replacement: "\\implies ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "=<", replacement: "\\impliedby ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "iff", replacement: "\\iff ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "->", replacement: "\\rightarrow ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "-<", replacement: "\\leftarrow ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "xright", replacement: "\\xrightarrow[${0: n \\to \\infty}]{$1}$2", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "xleft", replacement: "\\xleftarrow[${0: n \\to \\infty}]{$1}$2", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "\\leq>", replacement: "\\Leftrightarrow ", options: "mA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "===", replacement: "\\equiv ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "!=", replacement: "\\neq  ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: ">=", replacement: "\\geq  ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "<=", replacement: "\\leq  ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: ">>", replacement: "\\gg $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "<<", replacement: "\\ll $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "~=", replacement: "\\approx $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "~~", replacement: "\\sim $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: ":~=", replacement: "\\cong ", options: "mA", priority:1 },
    { trigger: ">~", replacement: "\\gtrsim ", options: "mA", priority:1 },
    { trigger: "<~", replacement: "\\lesssim ", options: "mA", priority:1 },
    
    { trigger: "uand", replacement: "\\cap ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "uorr", replacement: "\\cup ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vand", replacement: "\\wedge ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vorr", replacement: "\\vee ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Uand", replacement: "\\bigcap ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Uorr", replacement: "\\bigcup ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Vand", replacement: "\\bigwedge ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "Vorr", replacement: "\\bigvee ", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "inn", replacement: "\\in ", options: "mA", priority: 2},
    { trigger: "notin", replacement: "\\notin ", options: "mA" ,priority:1},
    { trigger: "ni", replacement: "\\ni ", options: "m" },
    { trigger: "\\xi nn", replacement: "x \\in ", options: "mA", priority:2 },
    { trigger: "sbst", replacement: "\\subset ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "\\subset eq", replacement: "\\subseteq ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "spst", replacement: "\\supset ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "\\supset eq", replacement: "\\supseteq ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "EE", replacement: "\\exists $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "AA", replacement: "\\forall $0", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "teq", replacement: "\\text{($0)}$1", options: "mA" },
    
    { trigger: "prop", replacement: "\\propto", options: "mA" },//∝
    { trigger: "nabl", replacement: "\\nabla", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "xx", replacement: "\\times", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "_{xx", replacement: "_{xx", options: "mA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "**", replacement: "\\cdot", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "prll", replacement: "\\parallel ", options: "mA" , priority: 1},
    { trigger: "prp", replacement: "\\perp", options: "mA" },//⊥
    { trigger: "pm", replacement: "\\pm ", options: "m" },
    { trigger: "eptset", replacement: "\\varnothing", options: "mA",priority:1 },
    { trigger: "circ", replacement: "\\circ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "neg", replacement: "\\neg", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "to", replacement: "\\to $0", options: "m", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "mid", replacement: "\\mid", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "abs", replacement: "\\lvert $0 \\rvert $1", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "norm", replacement: "\\lVert $0 \\rVert $1", options: "mA" },

    //Letters
    { trigger: "LL", replacement: "\\mathcal{L}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "XX", replacement: "\\mathcal{X}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "HH", replacement: "\\mathcal{H}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "OO", replacement: "\\mathcal{O}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "CC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "@i", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{i}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "@j", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{j}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "@k", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{k}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "@x", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{x}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "@y", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{y}}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{z}}", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    { trigger: "@u", replacement: "\\mathbf{u}", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "@n", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{n}}", options: "mA" },
    
    { trigger: "grad", replacement: "\\nabla$0", options: "mA" },

    { trigger: "(r|a|v|F|M|e|n|u)\\1", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "e([0-9])", replacement: "\\mathbf{e}_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA", priority: 1 },
    // { trigger: "\\\\pu{[^}]*?e([0-9])[^}]*?}", replacement: "hello", options: "rmA", priority: 2 },
     { trigger: "\\\\omegao", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{\\omega}", options: "rmA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "\\\\OmegaO", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{\\Omega}", options: "rmA", priority: 1 },
         { trigger: "\\\\thetat", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{\\theta}", options: "rmA", priority: 1 },
    { trigger: "\\\\alphaa", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{\\alpha}", options: "rmA", priority: 2 },

    { trigger: "\\sum F", replacement: "\\sum \\mathbf{F}", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "\\sum M", replacement: "\\sum \\mathbf{M} $0", options: "mA"},
    
    //Calculus
    { trigger: "pp", replacement: "\\partial", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "part", replacement: "\\dfrac{ \\partial ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x} } $2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dd", replacement: "\\mathrm{d}", options: "mA"},
    { trigger: "diff", replacement: "\\dfrac{ \\mathrm{d}${0:y} }{ \\mathrm{d}${1:x} } $2", options: "rmA" ,priority:1},

    { trigger: "oinf", replacement: "\\int_{0}^{\\infty} $0 \\, \\mathrm{d}${1:x} $2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "infi", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{\\infty} $0 \\, \\mathrm{d}${1:x} $2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dint", replacement: "\\int_{${0:0}}^{${1:\\infty}} $2 \\, \\mathrm{d}${3:x} $4", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "vint", replacement: "\\int_{$0}^{$1} $2 \\cdot \\mathrm{d}\\mathbf{${3:r}} $4", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "oint", replacement: "\\oint", options: "mA" ,priority:1},//conflict with in
    { trigger: "iiint", replacement: "\\iiint", options: "mA" ,priority:2},
    { trigger: "iint", replacement: "\\iint", options: "mA" ,priority:1},
    { trigger: "int", replacement: "\\int $0 \\, \\mathrm{d}${1:x} $2", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "oiint", replacement: "{\\subset\\!\\supset} \\llap{\\iint} $0", options: "mA" , priority:2},
    { trigger: "oiiint", replacement: "{\\bigcirc}\\kern-12.3pt{\\int}\\kern-7pt{\\int}\\kern-7pt{\\int} $0 \\, \\mathrm{d}${1:x} $2", options: "mA" ,priority:3},
    { trigger: "bigg", replacement: "\\bigg|_{${0:0}}^{${1:\\infty}} $2", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    
    { trigger: "tayl", replacement: "${0:f}(${1:x} + ${2:h}) = ${0:f}(${1:x}) + ${0:f}'(${1:x})${2:h} + ${0:f}''(${1:x}) \\dfrac{${2:h}^{2}}{2!} + \\dots$3", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dist", replacement: "\|\\mathbf{x}-\\mathbf{x}^{'}\| ", options: "mA" },

    //Electrodynamics
    { trigger: "maxw", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\\nabla\\times\\vec{E}=-\\dfrac{\\partial\\vec{B}}{\\partial t}\\\\\\nabla\\times\\vec{H}=\\vec{J_v}+\\dfrac{\\partial\\vec{D}}{\\partial t}\\\\\\nabla\\cdot\\vec{D}=\\rho_v\\\\\\nabla\\cdot\\vec{B}=0\\end{cases}\\quad ,\\begin{cases}\\vec{D}=\\epsilon\\vec{E}\\\\\\vec{B}=\\mu\\vec{H}\\\\\\vec{J_v}=\\sigma\\vec{E}\\end{cases} \n$0", options: "mA" },

    // Thermodynamics
    { trigger: "state", replacement: "\\begin{array}{c|c|c|c|c|c|c} \n \\text{state} & p[\\pu{kPa}] & T[^{\\circ}\\pu{C}] & u[\\pu{kJ/kg}] & h[\\pu{kJ/kg}]  & v[\\pu{m^3/kg}] & s[\\pu{kJ/kg*K}] \\\\ \n \\hline $0 \n \\end{array}", options: "m"},
        { trigger: "statesh", replacement: "\\begin{array}{c|c|c|c|c} \n \\text{state} & p[\\pu{kPa}] & T[^{\\circ}\\pu{C}] &  h[\\pu{kJ/kg}] & s[\\pu{kJ/kg*K}] \\\\ \n \\hline $0 \n \\end{array}", options: "m"},
    { trigger: "statept", replacement: "\\begin{array}{c|c|c} \n \\text{state} & p[\\pu{kPa}] & T[\\pu{K}] \\\\ \n \\hline $0 \n \\end{array}", options: "m"},
    
    // Thermology
    { trigger: "kbt", replacement: "k_{B}T", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "dbar", replacement: "\\mathrm{d}\\kern{-4.3pt}\\bar{\\small\\phantom{q}}", options: "mA", priority: 2 },

    // // Quantum mechanics
    // { trigger: "hba", replacement: "\\hbar", options: "mA" },//conflict with bar
    { trigger: "dag", replacement: "^{\\dagger}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "bra", replacement: "\\bra{$0} ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "ket", replacement: "\\ket{$0} ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "bkt", replacement: "\\braket{ $0 | $1 } ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "outp", replacement: "\\ket{${0:\\psi}} \\bra{${1:\\psi}} ", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "\\\\bra{([^|]+)\\|", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket" },//???
    { trigger: "\\\\bra{(.+)}([^ ]+)>", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket (alternate)" },//???

    //Tensor analysis
    { trigger: "tns", replacement: "{{$0}^{$1}}_{$2}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: ":tns", replacement: "{{$0}_{$1}}^{$2}", options: "mA" ,priority:1},
    { trigger: "kron", replacement: "\\delta_{${0:ij}}", options: "mA" },

    // Fluid Mechanics and Heat Transfer
    { trigger: "(Re|Fo|Pr|St|Nu|Eu|Bio|Gz|Gr|Ra)", replacement: "\\mathrm{[[0]]}", options: "mr" },
    

    
    //GR
    {trigger: "connection", replacement: "\\Gamma^${0:\\alpha}{ }_{${1:\\beta} ${2:\\gamma}}=\\dfrac{1}{2}g^{${0:\\alpha} ${3:\\mu}}(g_{${3:\\mu} ${1:\\beta},${2:\\gamma}}+g_{${3:\\mu} ${2:\\gamma},${1:\\beta}}-g_{${1:\\beta} ${2:\\gamma},${3:\\mu}})", options: "mA" 
    },
    { trigger: "riemanntns", replacement: "R^${0:\\rho}{ }_{${1:\\mu} ${2:\\nu} ${3:\\sigma}}=\\partial_${2:\\nu} \\Gamma^${0:\\rho}{}_{${1:\\mu} ${3:\\sigma}}-\\partial_${1:\\mu} \\Gamma^${0:\\rho}{}_{${2:\\nu} ${3:\\sigma}}+\\Gamma^\\lambda{}_{${3:\\sigma} ${1:\\mu}} \\Gamma^${0:\\rho}{}_{${2:\\nu} \\lambda}-\\Gamma^\\lambda{}_{${3:\\sigma} ${2:\\nu}} \\Gamma^${0:\\rho}{}_{${1:\\mu} \\lambda}", options: "mA" },

    //Misc
    { trigger: "qed", replacement: "\\tag*{$\\blacksquare$}", options: "mA" },
    { trigger: "משל", replacement: "\\blacksquare", options: "mA"},


    //BELOW RULES NEED PLUGINS
    //TikZJax
    { trigger: ":pic", replacement: "i.e.", options: "tA" },

    // Fields and matrices
    {trigger: "\\\\mathbb{(C|R|Z|N|1)}n", replacement: "\\mathbb{[[0]]}^{ ${0:n} }", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\mathbb{(C|R|Z|N|1)}mn", replacement: "\\mathbb{[[0]]}^{ ${0:m} \\times ${1:n} }", options: "rmA"},

    // Visual operations
    {trigger: "U", replacement: "\\underbrace{ ${VISUAL} }_{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "B", replacement: "\\underset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "O", replacement: "\\overbrace{ ${VISUAL} }^{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "I", replacement: "\\overset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "C", replacement: "\\cancel{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "K", replacement: "\\cancelto{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "S", replacement: "\\sqrt{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "A", replacement: "\\begin{aligned}\n${VISUAL}\n\\end{aligned}", options: "mA", description: "Align visual"},
    {trigger: "G", replacement: "\\begin{gathered}\n${VISUAL}\n\\end{gathered}", options: "mA", description: "Align visual"},
    {trigger: "C", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n${VISUAL}\n\\end{cases}", options: "mA", description: "Align visual"},
    {trigger: "X", replacement: "\\boxed \{\n${VISUAL}\n \}", options: "mA", description: "Box visual"},
    {trigger: "P", replacement: "\\pu \{${VISUAL} \}", options: "mA", description: "Units visual"},

    // Chemistry
    {trigger: "pu", replacement: "\\pu{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "msun", replacement: "M_{\\odot}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "solm", replacement: "M_{\\odot}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ce", replacement: "\\ce{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iso", replacement: "{}^{${0:4}}_{${1:2}}${2:He}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "hel4", replacement: "{}^{4}_{2}He ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "hel3", replacement: "{}^{3}_{2}He ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pH", replacement: "\\mathrm{pH} ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pOH", replacement: "\\mathrm{pOH} ", options: "mA"},
    
    // Words
    {trigger: "const", replacement: "\\text{const} ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "([_^]{supp)", replacement: "_{\\text{supply} ", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger : "([_^]{)(cv|total|ref|sys|env|CM|Carnot|in|out|rev|net|sur|cycle|ext|steam|air|table|int|rev|gen|reheat|avg|eq|UTS|st|ss|tr|step|wall|tot|cond|conv|rad|lm|rate|ice|beam|bar|cl|bend|tors|shear|lam|turb|new|old|all)", replacement: "[[0]]\\text{[[1]]}", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    
    //Symbols
    {trigger: "tick", replacement: "\\checkmark ", options: "mA"},

    // Units
    {trigger: "(${NUM})pu", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
	{trigger: "(${NUM})(Pa|kPa|MPa|GPa|m|mm|cm|K|kg|mol|kmol|W|Wh|MW|kW|bar|J|kJ|MJ|rpm|N|kN|s|h|A|V|HB|dB|T|Wb)", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]][[5]]}", options: "rm", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})ms", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]m.s^{-1}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})mss", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]m.s^{-2}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})mms", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]m^2.s^{-1}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})mmm", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]mm^{2}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})KW", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]K.W^{-1}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})Nm", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]N.m}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})WmK", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]W.m^{-1}.K^{-1}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})JkgK", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]J.kg^{-1}.K^{-1}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})kgmmm", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]kg.m^{-3}}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "(${NUM})WmmK", replacement: "\\pu{[[0]]W.m^{-2}.K^{-1}}", options: "rm"},

    
	{trigger: "dC", replacement: "^{\\circ}\\pu{C} ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "dA", replacement: "^{\\circ} ", options: "rm"},
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix, aligned, gather, gathered
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, begin, dfrac
